t-tokenomics-desc:
• Liquidity Pool (LP): 60% – PancakeSwap LP, locked for at least 12 months
• Presale: 22% – Allocated for official presales on launchpads such as GemPad / PinkSale
• Team: 8% – Locked for 12 months, then linearly vested for long-term development
• Marketing & Partnerships: 8% – Used for CEX listings, influencer campaigns, and community rewards
• Burn: 0% – No fixed burn; focus on liquidity and sustainable project growth
